name: Nether (debug version 0.2.3)
description: Just a little debug demo for my game (being made with gamemaker studio 1.4) :D Feedback is greatly appreciated. I am making a metroidvania platformer, with puzzle elements. Gamepad is supported. I will listen to any suggestions you guys have or feedback. I am actively developing this game, about 1-2 hours every day. Thanks for your time :D
